TopicTitle: Game minimizes when i click another screen

Articles.Content: I have a laptop with a monitor. so I have 2 screens in total. I play KSP on my laptop screen but when I'm in game and click whats on my monitor, my game minimizes. it didn't do this when I had windows 7, now I have windows 10.

Make a shortcut and type "-popupwindow" without the commas in the target field. Make sure you have fullscreen disabled.

Example:

"D:\Steam\SteamApps\common\Kerbal Space Program\KSP.exe" -popupwindow
